type.headline: Multi-Sig wallet
type.caption: A special type of wallet that require multiple parties to sign a transaction when spending funds or withdrawing rewards.

create.label: Create new Multi-Sig
create.caption: To create a new multi-signature wallet from existing wallets or by using external multi-sig keys

join.label: Join a Multi-Sig
join.caption: Participate in a multi-signature wallet by discovery or sharing your multi-sig public key with a friend from an already added wallet.

join.headline: Join a Multi-Sig
join.caption: Select option to show Multi-Sig Key, Discover, or import an exported Multi-Sig wallet.

key.label: Multi-Sig key
key.caption: Show Multi-Sig key of selected wallet to share with participant in charge of creating the Multi-Sig wallet

discover.label: Discover
discover.caption: Scans the blockchain for registered Multi-Sig wallets that include selected wallets Multi-Sig key

import.label: Import
import.caption: Load created and exported Multi-Sig wallet JSON files

pubkey.headline: Wallet Multi-Sig key
pubkey.caption: To share with Multi-Sig wallet creator.
pubkey.nopubkey: Multi-Sig key for selected wallet missing.

discover.headline: Discovered Multi-Sig wallets
discover.caption: Select discovered Multi-Sig wallets to add.

reused.toggle: Show MultiSig wallets with reused keys
reused.warning: Reused keys are possibly subject to a replay attack, use with caution!

discover.empty: No Multi-Sig wallets found for the selected wallet.

data.nostake: Multi-Sig wallet doesn't have any stake script registered
data.nodrep: Multi-Sig wallet doesn't have any DRep script registered

import.headline: Import Multi-Sig wallets
import.caption: Load created and exported Multi-Sig wallet JSON files.

error.invalid: Not a valid Multi-Sig export, should follow CSL AuxiliaryDataJSON format
error.nometa: Imported file has no label 1854 metadata
error.duplicate: A Multi-Sig wallet with the same scripts already imported, ignoring duplicate file

create.headline: Multi-Sig type
create.caption: Are your participants all equal or are they part of groups / entities?

simple.label: Simple
simple.caption: A scenario where all participants are equal.

advanced.label: Advanced (soon)
advanced.caption: Participants are part of individual groups, forming multiple layers.

simple.headline: Multi-Sig setup
simple.caption: Set a name and an optional description for your Multi-Sig wallet.

name.label: Wallet Name
name.placeholder: Please enter a name for the wallet

participants.headline: Add participants
participants.caption: Specify the individuals that should be part of the multi-sig from loaded wallets or by inputting multi-sig public key.

info.minimum: A minimum of two participants required to form a simple multi-sig wallet

error.duplicate: A participant with the same multi-sig key has already been added, please select another.

requiredSigners.headline: Required Signers
requiredSigners.caption: How many participants need to confirm when signing?

register.headline: Register
register.caption: Select the option to either register or download the newly created Multi-Sig wallet.

register.label: Register
register.caption: Create a transaction to register the multi-signature wallet on-chain. This allows for automatic discovery by participants and is the recommended option.

download.label: Download
download.caption: Downloads a file to be shared with participants for manual import.

error.nofeewallet: No wallet found to use as fee wallet for Multi-Sig registration transaction.

register.exist: Wallet already exist, redirecting to wallet

missing.headline: Create Multi-Sig Keys
missing.mnemonic: This wallet is missing multi-sig keys, please enter your wallet password to create them.
missing.hardware: This wallet is missing multi-sig keys, please click sign and follow hardware device instructions to derive them.

save.ok: Multi-Sig keys successfully generated and saved to wallet
save.error: Failed to save multi-sig keys to wallet, please try again!
